# lenient

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether parsing allows any discrepencies in the expected format.

## Declaration

```swift
var lenient: Bool
```

## Accessing strategy properties

- **formatStyle**: The format style this strategy uses when parsing strings.

items.description: The format style this strategy uses when parsing strings.
